column2: On the Monday a detective policeman, dressed of course in rustic disguise but not the less known to every one in the place, was wandering about between Dillsborough and Dillsborough Wood and making futile inquiries as to the purchase of strychnine,--and also as to the purchase of red herrings.
column3: On the Monday a detective policeman, dressed of course in rustic disguise but not the less known to every one in the place, was wandering about between Dillsborough and Dillsborough Wood and making futile inquiries as to the purchase of strychnine,--and also as to the purchase of red herrings.

column2: But every one knew, and such leading people as Runciman and Dr. Nupper were not slow to declare, that Dillsborough was the only place in England in which one might be sure that those articles had not been purchased.
column3: But every one knew, and such leading people as Runciman and dr Nupper were not slow to declare, that Dillsborough was the only place in England in which one might be sure that those articles had not been purchased.

column2: And on the Tuesday it began to be understood that Goarly had applied to Bearside, the other attorney, in reference to his claim against Lord Rufford's pheasants.
column3: And on the Tuesday it began to be understood that Goarly had applied to Bearside, the other attorney, in reference to his claim against Lord Rufford's pheasants.

column2: He had contemptuously refused the 7_s._ 6_d._ an acre offered him, and put his demand at 40_s._ As to the poisoned fox and the herrings and the strychnine Goarly declared that he didn't care if there were twenty detectives in the place.
column3: He had contemptuously refused the seven underscore s.underscore six underscore d.underscore an acre offered him, and put his demand at forty underscore s.underscore As to the poisoned fox and the herrings and the strychnine Goarly declared that he didn't care if there were twenty detectives in the place.

column2: He stated it to be his opinion that Larry Twentyman had put down the poison.
column3: He stated it to be his opinion that Larry Twentyman had put down the poison.

column2: It was all very well, Goarly said, for Larry to be fond of gentlemen and to ride to hounds, and make pretences;--but Larry liked his turkeys as well as anybody else, and Larry had put down the poison.
column3: It was all very well, Goarly said, for Larry to be fond of gentlemen and to ride to hounds, and make pretences;--but Larry liked his turkeys as well as anybody else, and Larry had put down the poison.

column2: In this matter Goarly overreached himself.
column3: In this matter Goarly overreached himself.

column2: No one in Dillsborough could be brought to believe that.
column3: No one in Dillsborough could be brought to believe that.

column2: Even Harry Stubbings was ready to swear that he should suspect himself as soon.
column3: Even Harry Stubbings was ready to swear that he should suspect himself as soon.

column2: But nothing was clearer than this,--that Goarly was going to make a stand against the hunt and especially against Lord Rufford.
column3: But nothing was clearer than this,--that Goarly was going to make a stand against the hunt and especially against Lord Rufford.

column2: He had gone to Bearside and Bearside had taken up the matter in a serious way.
column3: He had gone to Bearside and Bearside had taken up the matter in a serious way.

column2: Then it became known very quickly that Bearside had already received money, and it was surmised that Goarly had some one at his back.
column3: Then it became known very quickly that Bearside had already received money, and it was surmised that Goarly had some one at his back.

column2: Lord Rufford had lately ejected from a house of his on the other side of the county a discontented litigious retired grocer from Rufford, who had made some money and had set himself up in a pretty little residence with a few acres of land.
column3: Lord Rufford had lately ejected from a house of his on the other side of the county a discontented litigious retired grocer from Rufford, who had made some money and had set himself up in a pretty little residence with a few acres of land.

column2: The man had made himself objectionable and had been dispossessed.
column3: The man had made himself objectionable and had been dispossessed.

column2: The man's name was Scrobby; and hence had come these sorrows.
column3: The man's name was Scrobby; and hence had come these sorrows.

column2: This was the story that had already made itself known in Dillsborough on the Tuesday evening.
column3: This was the story that had already made itself known in Dillsborough on the Tuesday evening.

column2: But up to that time not a tittle of evidence had come to light as to the purchase of the red herrings or the strychnine.
column3: But up to that time not a tittle of evidence had come to light as to the purchase of the red herrings or the strychnine.

column2: All that was known was the fact that had not Tony Tuppett stopped the hounds before they reached the wood, there must have been a terrible mortality.
column3: All that was known was the fact that had not Tony Tuppett stopped the hounds before they reached the wood, there must have been a terrible mortality.

column2: It's that nasty, beastly, drunken club, said Mrs. Masters to her husband.
column3: It's that nasty, beastly, drunken club, said mrs Masters to her husband.

column2: Of course it was at this time known to the lady that her husband had thrown away Goarly's business and that it had been transferred to Bearside.
column3: Of course it was at this time known to the lady that her husband had thrown away Goarly's business and that it had been transferred to Bearside.

column2: It was also surmised by her, as it was by the town in general, that Goarly's business would come to considerable dimensions;--just the sort of case as would have been sure to bring popularity if carried through, as Nickem, the senior clerk, would have carried it.
column3: It was also surmised by her, as it was by the town in general, that Goarly's business would come to considerable dimensions;--just the sort of case as would have been sure to bring popularity if carried through, as Nickem, the senior clerk, would have carried it.

column2: And as soon as Scrobby's name was heard by Mrs. Masters, there was no end to the money in the lady's imagination to which this very case might not have amounted.
